001package pkg_class;
002
003/**
004 * This class is part of the RPandaScape application. 
005 * RPandaScape is a very simple, text based adventure game. 
006 * 
007 * Describe an Item by it's name, description, weight and price.
008 * An Item can be either carried/used/taken/dropped by a player.
009 * By default all items are in Rooms.
010 * 
011 * The class Item contains methods in order to get and set it's attributes.
012 * 
013 * A list of Item is an ItemList.
014 * 
015 * @author Elie DUBOUX
016 * @version 2021.12.12
017 * @see pkg_class.pkg_item.ItemList
018 */
019public class Item
020{
021    /**
022     * The name.
023     */
024    protected String aName;
025    /**
026     * The description.
027     */
028    protected String aDescription;
029    /**
030     * The weight.
031     */
032    protected int aWeight;
033    /**
034     * The price.
035     */
036    protected int aPrice;
037    /**
038     * Constructor.
039     * @param pName The name of the item.
040     * @param pDescription The description of the item.
041     * @param pWeight The weight of the item.
042     * @param pPrice The price of the item.
043     */
044    public Item(final String pName, final String pDescription, final int pWeight,
045                final int pPrice)
046    {
047        this.aName = pName;
048        this.aDescription = pDescription;
049        this.aWeight = pWeight;
050        this.aPrice = pPrice;
051    }//Item()
052    
053    /**
054     * Set the weight to a given int.
055     * @param pWeight The given int.
056     */
057    public void setWeight(final int pWeight)
058    {
059        this.aWeight = pWeight;
060    }//setWeight()
061    
062    /**
063     * Return the name of the item.
064     * @return The name.
065     */
066    public String getName()
067    {
068        return this.aName;
069    }//getName()
070    
071    /**
072     * Return the description of the item.
073     * @return The description.
074     */
075    public String getDescription()
076    {
077        return this.aDescription;
078    }//getDescription()
079    
080    /**
081     * Return the weight of the item.
082     * @return The weight.
083     */
084    public int getWeight()
085    {
086        return this.aWeight;
087    }//getWeight()
088    
089    /**
090     * NOT USED NOW (but will be useful in the futur)
091     * Return the price of the item.
092     * @return The price.
093     */
094    public int getPrice()
095    {
096        return this.aPrice;
097    }//getPrice()
098
099    
100    @Override public String toString()
101    {
102        return this.aName + " : {" + " Weight(" + this.aWeight + ")" + " Price(" + this.aPrice+ ") }\n";
103    }
104}//Item
